author: Tim Kroupa
comment: This is great, however, I really don't like the ambient mode.  I think it would look so much better and be easier to read by getting rid of the background dots and just showing the time.
title: Great, but...

author: Carl Freeman
comment: Really responsive developers. It looks great on my watch, lots of customization settings. Lots of potential.
title: Great looking watchface

author: Mark P
comment: Not just the same boring watchface, it's like a mini C64 demo on your wrist
title: Very clever
